title: Bradley Cooper and Sienna Miller talk Hollywood wage gap, new film
text: Bradley Cooper and Sienna Miller talk Hollywood wage gap, new film Friday, 23 October 2015 (4 minutes ago) "Burnt" co-stars who are reuniting after "American Sniper" are vocalizing their take on the gender pay disparity Bradley Cooper Applauds Sienna Miller For Fighting For Better Wage 00:46 Bradley Cooper has stepped into the ongoing Hollywood debate over equal wages by saluting his “American Sniper” co-star Sienna Miller for standing firm and pulling out of a play over poor pay.The Brit was promoting the pair’s new movie, “Burnt,” when she revealed she quit a theatrical...
